Class MinigameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion

        • com.kroy.game.minigameHelpers.MinigameEngine

  • public class MinigameEngine
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
    Class created by Team Septagon Used to handle the engine that is used for the minigame
